title._content: Image taken from page 50 of '[The Practical Miner's Guide; comprising a set of trigonometrical tables, adapted to all the purposes of ... dialling ... Also a treatise on the art and practice of assaying silver, copper, lead, and tin, etc. [With plates.]]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Practical Miner's Guide; comprising a set of trigonometrical tables, adapted to all the purposes of ... dialling ... Also a treatise on the art and practice of assaying silver, copper, lead, and tin, etc. [With plates.]]" Author: BUDGE, John - Writer on Mining Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 726.i.33." Page: 50 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1845 Publisher: Longmans & Co. Edition: Second edition, considerably enlarged. [With a portrait.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000518971 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
